name: Rise Of The Overlords
description:
Rise of the Overlords is an online multiplayer game that combines collectible card games (CCG) with board strategy games. Build your deck, command your army, and challenge other players in epic combats on stunning dynamic battlefields.

Rise of the Overlords is completely free and learning how to play will only take you 5 minutes!


  • Choose an Overlord with unique abilities to represent you on the battlefield.
  • Build your deck with powerful units, spells and equipment.
  • Strategically summon and move your units on the stage. Every square matters!
  • Fight epic battles in dynamic battlefields: Destructible walls, explosive barrels, lava, blizzards...
  • Develop your strategy to adapt to your opponent and the battlefield.


Each of the factions in Rise of the Overlords has its own synergies and playstyle, although all of them can be combined with a wide range of neutral cards to create countless different strategies.


For now, there are three factions available, but in the future two more factions will join the fight. Choose the faction that best represents your play style:

  • The Feral Tribes focus on brute force and direct combat. They have ways to deal huge amounts of damage in exchange for damaging their own units, but they also have powerful units that benefit from taking damage!
  • The Sons of Erendriel focus on performing fast, fluid combos while keeping the opponent at bay with powerful disabling spells and slippery units, waiting for the perfect moment to deliver the final blow.
  • The Kingdom of Amerald does not have very powerful units, but its battalions are unstoppable thanks to their healing spells and powerful defensive equipment! There is no one who wins them in battles of attrition.
